verses.verse: In the beginning <S%G746><s%> was the Word, <S%G3056><s%> and the Word <S%G3056><s%> was with God, <S%G2316><s%> and the Word <S%G3056><s%> was God. <S%G2316><s%>
The same <S%G3778><s%> was in the beginning <S%G746><s%> with God. <S%G2316><s%>
All <S%G3956><s%> things were made <S%G1096><s%> by him; and without <S%G5565><s%> him was not any <S%G1520><s%> thing made <S%G1096><s%> that was made. <S%G1096><s%>
In him was life; <S%G2222><s%> and the life <S%G2222><s%> was the light <S%G5457><s%> of men. <S%G444><s%>
And the light <S%G5457><s%> shines <S%G5316><s%> in darkness; <S%G4653><s%> and the darkness <S%G4653><s%> comprehended <S%G2638><s%> it not.
There was a man <S%G444><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> from God, <S%G2316><s%> whose <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> was John. <S%G2491><s%>

The same <S%G3778><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> for a witness, <S%G3141><s%> to bear <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> of the Light, <S%G5457><s%> that all <S%G3956><s%> men through <S%G1223><s%> him might believe. <S%G4100><s%>
He was not that Light, <S%G5457><s%> but was sent to bear <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> of that Light. <S%G5457><s%>
That was the true <S%G228><s%> Light, <S%G5457><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> lights <S%G5461><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G444><s%> that comes <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world. <S%G2889><s%>
He was in the world, <S%G2889><s%> and the world <S%G2889><s%> was made <S%G1096><s%> by him, and the world <S%G2889><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> him not.
He came <S%G2064><s%> to his own, and his own received <S%G3880><s%> him not.

But as many <S%G3745><s%> as received <S%G2983><s%> him, to them gave <S%G1325><s%> he power <S%G1849><s%> to become <S%G1096><s%> the sons <S%G5043><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> even to them that believe <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> his name: <S%G3686><s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> were born, <S%G1080><s%> not of blood, <S%G129><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> of the will <S%G2307><s%> of the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> of the will <S%G2307><s%> of man, <S%G435><s%> but of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And the Word <S%G3056><s%> was made <S%G1096><s%> flesh, <S%G4561><s%> and dwelled <S%G4637><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> us, (and we beheld <S%G2300><s%> his glory, <S%G1391><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> as of the only <S%G3439><s%> begotten <S%G3439><s%> of the Father, <S%G3962><s%>) full <S%G4134><s%> of grace <S%G5485><s%> and truth. <S%G225><s%>

John <S%G2491><s%> bore <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> of him, and cried, <S%G2896><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> was he of whom <S%G3739><s%> I spoke, <S%G2036><s%> He that comes <S%G2064><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> me is preferred <S%G1715><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> me: for he was before <S%G4413><s%> me.
And of his fullness <S%G4138><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> we received, <S%G2983><s%> and grace <S%G5485><s%> for grace. <S%G5485><s%>
For the law <S%G3551><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> by Moses, <S%G3475><s%> but grace <S%G5485><s%> and truth <S%G225><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> by Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

No <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> has seen <S%G3708><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> at <S%G4455><s%> any <S%G4455><s%> time, <S%G4455><s%> the only <S%G3439><s%> begotten <S%G3439><s%> Son, <S%G5207><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in the bosom <S%G2859><s%> of the Father, <S%G3962><s%> he has declared <S%G1834><s%> him.

And this <S%G3778><s%> is the record <S%G3141><s%> of John, <S%G2491><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> priests <S%G2409><s%> and Levites <S%G3019><s%> from Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> to ask <S%G2065><s%> him, Who <S%G5101><s%> are <S%G1488><s%> you?
And he confessed, <S%G3670><s%> and denied <S%G720><s%> not; but confessed, <S%G3670><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> not the Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

And they asked <S%G2065><s%> him, What <S%G5101><s%> then? <S%G3767><s%> Are <S%G1488><s%> you Elias? <S%G2243><s%> And he said, <S%G3004><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> not. Are <S%G1488><s%> you that prophet? <S%G4396><s%> And he answered, <S%G611><s%> No. <S%G3756><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> they to him, Who <S%G5101><s%> are <S%G1488><s%> you? that we may give <S%G1325><s%> an answer <S%G612><s%> to them that sent <S%G3992><s%> us. What <S%G5101><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> you of yourself? <S%G4572><s%>

He said, <S%G5346><s%> I am the voice <S%G5456><s%> of one crying <S%G994><s%> in the wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> Make <S%G2116><s%> straight <S%G2116><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> as said <S%G2036><s%> the prophet <S%G4396><s%> Esaias. <S%G2268><s%>
And they which <S%G3588><s%> were sent <S%G649><s%> were of the Pharisees. <S%G5330><s%>

And they asked <S%G2065><s%> him, and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Why <S%G5101><s%> baptize <S%G907><s%> you then, <S%G3767><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> you be not that Christ, <S%G5547><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> Elias, <S%G2243><s%> neither that prophet? <S%G4396><s%>

John <S%G2491><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> I baptize <S%G907><s%> with water: <S%G5204><s%> but there stands <S%G2476><s%> one among <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5216><s%> you, whom <S%G3739><s%> you know <S%G1492><s%> not;

He it is, who <S%G3588><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> me is preferred <S%G1096><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> me, whose <S%G3739><s%> shoe's <S%G5266><s%> lace <S%G2438><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> not worthy <S%G514><s%> to unloose. <S%G3089><s%>
These <S%G5023><s%> things were done <S%G1096><s%> in Bethabara <S%G962><s%> beyond <S%G4008><s%> Jordan, <S%G2446><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> was baptizing. <S%G907><s%>

The next <S%G1887><s%> day <S%G1887><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> sees <S%G991><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> to him, and said, <S%G3004><s%> Behold <S%G2396><s%> the Lamb <S%G286><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> takes <S%G142><s%> away the sin <S%G266><s%> of the world. <S%G2889><s%>

This <S%G3778><s%> is he of whom <S%G3739><s%> I said, <S%G2036><s%> After <S%G3694><s%> me comes <S%G2064><s%> a man <S%G435><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is preferred <S%G1096><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> me: for he was before <S%G4413><s%> me.

And I knew <S%G1492><s%> him not: but that he should be made <S%G5319><s%> manifest <S%G5319><s%> to Israel, <S%G2474><s%> therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> am I come <S%G2064><s%> baptizing <S%G907><s%> with water. <S%G5204><s%>

And John <S%G2491><s%> bore <S%G3140><s%> record, <S%G3140><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> I saw <S%G2300><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> descending <S%G2597><s%> from heaven <S%G3772><s%> like <S%G5616><s%> a dove, <S%G4058><s%> and it stayed <S%G3306><s%> on him.

And I knew <S%G1492><s%> him not: but he that sent <S%G3992><s%> me to baptize <S%G907><s%> with water, <S%G5204><s%> the same <S%G1565><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to me, On whom <S%G3739><s%> you shall see <S%G1492><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> descending, <S%G2597><s%> and remaining <S%G3306><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> him, the same <S%G3778><s%> is he which baptizes <S%G907><s%> with the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost. <S%G4151><s%>
And I saw, <S%G3708><s%> and bore <S%G3140><s%> record <S%G3140><s%> that this <S%G3778><s%> is the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
Again <S%G3825><s%> the next <S%G1887><s%> day <S%G1887><s%> after <S%G1887><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> stood, <S%G2476><s%> and two <S%G1417><s%> of his disciples; <S%G3101><s%>
And looking <S%G1689><s%> on Jesus <S%G2424><s%> as he walked, <S%G4043><s%> he said, <S%G3004><s%> Behold <S%G2396><s%> the Lamb <S%G286><s%> of God! <S%G2316><s%>
And the two <S%G1417><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> him speak, <S%G2980><s%> and they followed <S%G190><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> turned, <S%G4762><s%> and saw <S%G2300><s%> them following, <S%G190><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, What <S%G5101><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> you? They said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Rabbi, <S%G4461><s%> (which <S%G3739><s%> is to say, <S%G3004><s%> being interpreted, <S%G2059><s%> Master, <S%G1320><s%>) where <S%G4226><s%> dwell <S%G3306><s%> you?

He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Come <S%G2064><s%> and see. <S%G1492><s%> They came <S%G2064><s%> and saw <S%G1492><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> he dwelled, <S%G3306><s%> and stayed <S%G3306><s%> with him that day: <S%G2250><s%> for it was about <S%G5613><s%> the tenth <S%G1182><s%> hour. <S%G5610><s%>

One <S%G1520><s%> of the two <S%G1417><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> speak, and followed <S%G190><s%> him, was Andrew, <S%G406><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter's <S%G4074><s%> brother. <S%G80><s%>

He first <S%G4413><s%> finds <S%G2147><s%> his own brother <S%G80><s%> Simon, <S%G4613><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, We have found <S%G2147><s%> the Messias, <S%G3323><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is, being interpreted, <S%G3177><s%> the Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

And he brought <S%G71><s%> him to Jesus. <S%G2424><s%> And when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> beheld <S%G1689><s%> him, he said, <S%G2036><s%> You are <S%G1488><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of Jona: <S%G2495><s%> you shall be called <S%G2564><s%> Cephas, <S%G2786><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is by interpretation, <S%G2059><s%> A stone. <S%G4074><s%>

The day <S%G1887><s%> following <S%G1887><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> would <S%G2309><s%> go <S%G1831><s%> forth <S%G1831><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and finds <S%G2147><s%> Philip, <S%G5376><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Follow <S%G190><s%> me.
Now <S%G1161><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%> was of Bethsaida, <S%G966><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%> of Andrew <S%G406><s%> and Peter. <S%G4074><s%>

Philip <S%G5376><s%> finds <S%G2147><s%> Nathanael, <S%G3482><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, We have found <S%G2147><s%> him, of whom <S%G3739><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> in the law, <S%G3551><s%> and the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> did write, <S%G1125><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of Nazareth, <S%G3478><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of Joseph. <S%G2501><s%>

And Nathanael <S%G3482><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Can <S%G1410><s%> there any <S%G5100><s%> good <S%G18><s%> thing come <S%G1511><s%> out of Nazareth? <S%G3478><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Come <S%G2064><s%> and see. <S%G1492><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> Nathanael <S%G3482><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> to him, and said <S%G3004><s%> of him, Behold <S%G2396><s%> an Israelite <S%G2475><s%> indeed, <S%G230><s%> in whom <S%G3739><s%> is no <S%G3756><s%> guile! <S%G1388><s%>

Nathanael <S%G3482><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, From where <S%G4159><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> you me? Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Before <S%G4253><s%> that Philip <S%G5376><s%> called <S%G5455><s%> you, when you were <S%G5607><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the fig <S%G4808><s%> tree, <S%G4808><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> you.

Nathanael <S%G3482><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Rabbi, <S%G4461><s%> you are <S%G1488><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> you are <S%G1488><s%> the King <S%G935><s%> of Israel. <S%G2474><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Because <S%G3754><s%> I said <S%G2036><s%> to you, I saw <S%G1492><s%> you under <S%G5273><s%> the fig <S%G4808><s%> tree, <S%G4808><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> you? you shall see <S%G3700><s%> greater <S%G3187><s%> things than these. <S%G5130><s%>

And he said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, Hereafter <S%G737><s%> you shall see <S%G3700><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> open, <S%G455><s%> and the angels <S%G32><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> ascending <S%G305><s%> and descending <S%G2597><s%> on the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man. <S%G444><s%>
